repl_text_main_desc: Fills a strided array with pseudorandom numbers drawn from a Bernoulli distribution.
repl_text_ndarray_desc: Fills a strided array with pseudorandom numbers drawn from a Bernoulli distribution using alternative indexing semantics.
repl_text_factory_desc: Returns a function for filling strided arrays with pseudorandom numbers drawn from a Bernoulli distribution.
